sentences.english: Two years later, she made her mother, a three enjoyable.

sentences.chinese: 我们家人口众多，其乐融融。

sentences.english: The days are warm and sunny…
sentences.chinese: 每天都暖融融的，充满阳光。

sentences.english: Come into the warmth of the Fortnum and Mason tearoom .

sentences.english: The sign on the wall seemed to quaver under a film of sliding warm water.
sentences.chinese: 墙上的招牌好象在一层浮动的融融的水流下颤动。

sentences.english: Love is when they gaze into your eyes and it warms your heart.
sentences.chinese: 爱情是当有人凝视你双眼时你的心窝暖意融融。

sentences.english: She writes in her thesis that the new translation fits in with ancient texts.

sentences.english: That old man is basking in the love of his family.

sentences.english: She gently asked, smiling as her heart began to fill with warmth.
